text:
from these simpler methods be used as a baseline in performance that more elaborate methods
must clear in order to justify their usage. It also highlights the need to not just consider the
careful use of data preparation methods, but to actively test multiple diﬀerent combinations of
data preparation schemes for a given problem in order to discover what works best, even in the
case of classical methods.
Machine learning and deep learning methods may still achieve better performance on speciﬁc
